title: Number of nursery schools in the United Kingdom 2010 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of schools. In total the number of data points it has is 9.
In general Number of schools has stayed the same over the Year.

Number of schools is roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2012/13, slightly decreasing from 2012/13 to 2014/15, slightly increasing from 2014/15 to 2015/16, and finally roughly constant from 2015/16 to 2018/19.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014/15 and 2015/16.
Maximum Number of schools, about 3.13 was reported at Year 2010/11
The lowest Number of schools, of value 2.97 was reported at Year 2014/15
